title: Very berry cheesecake
ingredients: ['Base', '250g (8 oz) digestive biscuits, crushed', '125g (4 oz) butter, melted', 'Filling', '2 (200g) tubs cream cheese, softened', '150g (5 oz) caster sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250g (8 oz) cottage cheese', '4 tablespoons cherry brandy', '3 eggs', 'Berry topping', '500g (1 1/4 lb) fresh blackberries', '1 tablespoon cherry brandy', '1 tablespoon caster sugar']
